summary: E2E testing of DoersProfiler (/dp) and DoersOneFamily (/family) pages. Both pages successfully fetch real data from backend APIs. Backend APIs (POST/GET profiles, families) working correctly. Frontend gracefully handles missing /api/families/user/{userId} endpoint by creating new family.

minor.issue: Endpoint not implemented in backend but frontend tries to call it. Frontend handles 404 gracefully by creating new family.

passed_tests: Backend API root returns 200 with 'Right Doers World' message
POST /api/profiles creates profile with DoersScore (300-900 range), 6 dimensions, skills
GET /api/profiles/{id} retrieves profile correctly
GET /api/profiles/user/{userId} retrieves profile by user ID
GET /api/profiles/{id} returns 404 for non-existent profile
POST /api/families creates family with calculated family_doers_score
GET /api/families/{id} retrieves family correctly
GET /api/families/{id} returns 404 for non-existent family
POST /api/seed seeds data successfully
DoersProfiler (/dp) loads profile from backend (DP-258B1A65)
DoersProfiler shows DoersScore 728/900 from backend
DoersProfiler shows Efficiency Value 64% calculated from backend data
DoersProfiler shows Natural Fit 80%, Developed Skills 54%, Learning Agility 71%
DoersProfiler 6 Dimensions tab shows all 6 dimensions with scores
DoersProfiler Share modal opens with all share options (WhatsApp, LinkedIn, X/Twitter, Facebook, Email, Copy)
DoersOneFamily (/family) creates new family when user has none
DoersOneFamily shows Family DoersScore 736 calculated from members
DoersOneFamily shows 3 family members (Father, Mother, Daughter)
DoersOneFamily Daughter has 'First Student' badge and DoersScore 810
DoersOneFamily language toggle works (EN/ಕನ್ನಡ)
DoersOneFamily shows family goals (Dubai Vacation, Higher Education, Home Renovation)
DoersOneFamily AI Assistants section visible
action_items: Consider adding /api/families/user/{userId} endpoint to backend for consistency with frontend API service (LOW priority - frontend handles gracefully)
critical_code_review_comments: Frontend api.js has familyAPI.getByUserId() but backend doesn't have corresponding endpoint - frontend handles 404 gracefully
Family creation happens twice in console logs due to React StrictMode double-rendering in development
seed_data_creation: Used existing seed data from /api/seed endpoint
context_for_next_testing_agent: DoersProfiler and DoersOneFamily pages are fully integrated with backend. Profile ID format is DP-XXXXXXXX, Family ID format is FAM-XXXXXXXX. DoersScore range is 300-900. Efficiency Value is calculated as (Skills × 0.6) + (NaturalFit × 0.3) + (LearningAgility × 0.1). Family DoersScore is average of member scores. Missing /api/families/user/{userId} endpoint is handled gracefully by frontend creating new family.
